name: Hazmat (AddothGames)
description:
Made in 3 hours for the Trijam68 gamejam, the theme is "keep distance",
wearing a brick-shaped hazmat-suit over your brickshaped body you move around the building, finding and leading the blue patients to the beds on the north and south sides of the complex,

but watch out, get to close to the green infected people and the disease spreads, save as many patients as possible, the game ends when there are no patients left.

use WASD to move, lead patients by walking close to them, get them to the beds and KEEP YOUR DISTANCE!

highest theoretical score is 26!
